sentences.english: After days of hard work, he had a good night sleep at last.
sentences.chinese: 勞累多日，今天他終於得到了一夕安寢。

sentences.english: The third section is called the Memorial Hall, where the tablets for all ancestors are enshrined .
sentences.chinese: 第三進叫做“寢堂”，歷代祖先的牌位在這裏安寢。

sentences.english: Emperor Yan and Emperor Shun are all buried in Hunan.
sentences.chinese: 中華民族的始祖炎帝以及舜帝，也安寢在湖南。
